datenschutz.aenderungen-der-datenschutzerklaerung: Changes to the data protection declaration
datenschutz.aenderungen-der-datenschutzerklaerung-te: I reserve the right to adjust this data protection declaration if necessary to meet the legal requirements or to implement changes of my online tool. The current version is available on this website.
datenschutz.allgemeine-hinweise-text: The protection of your personal data is particularly important to me. I process your data exclusively on the basis of the legal provisions (GDPR, TMG). In this data protection declaration, I will inform you about the most important aspects of data processing in connection with the use of my online tool "Choreo Planner".
datenschutz.ihre-rechte-text: You always have the right to information about the data stored about you, its origin and recipient as well as the purpose of data processing. In addition, you have the right to correct, block or delete this data, if applicable. Please contact:
datenschutz.kontakt-text: If you have any questions about processing your data or this data protection declaration, please contact me at:
datenschutz.sicherheit-der-datenverarbeitung-text: I use adequate technical and organizational measures to ensure that your data is protected against loss, abuse or unauthorized access.
datenschutz.verarbeitung-personenbezogener-daten-tex: Storage of data: The online tool "Choreo Planner" can be used completely free of charge. No personal data from users are collected, saved or processed that could be used to identify people.
Use of cookies: The website does not use cookies to save or track user data.

Server log files: When visiting the website, technical data is automatically recorded by the web server (e.g. IP address, date and time of access, accessed pages). This data is stored anonymously and serve exclusively for technical monitoring and improvement in operation. There is no assignment to certain people.
datenschutz.weitergabe-von-daten-an-dritte: Delivery of data to third parties
datenschutz.weitergabe-von-daten-an-dritte-text: Your data will not be sold, rented or otherwise passed on to third parties. There is no disclosure of data for commercial or non-commercial purposes.

editView.alle-mitglieder-deines-teams-stehen-scho: All members of your team are already on the mat.
editView.bisher-steht-noch-kein-teammitglied-auf-: So far, no team member is on the mat.

errors.offline: The servers are currently offline. Please try again later!

datenschutz.answer: Please read about data protection in our [data protection declaration](/datenschutz).

funktionen-wuenschen.answer: **Yes!** We look forward to any features that we can incorporate into the choreo planner. If you wish for a feature, please feel free to send us an email to [info@choreoplaner.de](mailto:info@choreo-planer.de) or a DM on Instagram an @choreoplaner. We will then consider whether we can implement this feature. If do, we will of course inform you about it.
funktionen-wuenschen.question: Can I request features?

neue-season.answer: No! You can easily start a new season with your existing team and set up the squad. You can even take participants from other seasons or even other teams to the new season.
neue-season.question: Do I have to create a new team for every season?

probleme-melden.answer: Problems can currently only be reported by email to [info@choreoplaner.de] (mailto: info@choreoplaner.de) or as a DM on Instagram to @choreoplaner. A contact form is planned.
probleme-melden.question: How can I report problems?

versehentlich-geloescht.answer:
Yes, but not yourself! You can contact us at any time. Then the following data can be restored:
  • User accounts
  • Clubs
  • Teams
  • Seasons
  • Choreos
  • Rosters
Please describe in your contact by email to [info@choreoplaner.de](mailto: info@choreoplaner.de) or as a DM on Instagram an @choreoplaner the date and the time of deletion so that we can quickly solve your problem.
versehentlich-geloescht.question: I accidentally deleted something. Can I undo that?

warum-offline.answer:
The choreo planner is a **free** project. Therefore, the servers may not always be reached. We have prepared a list of reasons why you cannot reach the servers:
  1. The servers are serviced by us. In this case you can't do anything except to wait and hope that we are finished quickly. If you would like to know when the servers can be reached again, you are welcome to send us an email to [info@choreoplaner.de](mailto:info@choreo-planer.de) or a DM on Instagram an @choreoplaner.
  2. Our internet connection failed. Since there is no budget available to insure a fail-safe internet connection, it can happen that our internet connection fails. In this case you can't do anything except to wait and hope that we are finished quickly. If you would like to know when the servers can be reached again, you are welcome to send us an email to [info@choreoplaner.de](mailto:info@choreo-planer.de) or a DM on Instagram an @choreoplaner.
  3. Your internet connection has failed. If you have already loaded our website, you can charge the website again without an internet connection, but you cannot charge new data. In this case, you can try to restore your internet connection. If you need help, you can't write us email, because you have no internet.
If you would like to support the choreo planner, you can support us by articipating in project development or making a donation. We have not yet prepared a way for that, but we are working on it. If you would like to support us, you are welcome to send us an email to [info@choreoplaner.de](mailto:info@choreo-planer.de) or a DM on Instagram an @choreoplaner .
warum-offline.question: Why can the server be offline?

was-ist-choreo-planer.answer: The choreo planner is a **free** project that is developed for cheerleaders. The choreo planner should make it possible to create choreos and share them with others. The choreo planner should make it possible to simplify and digitize the planning of choreos. Above all, it should be possible to teach the participants in a simplified manner. The end products (countsheets, pictures and videos) are to be distributed to the teams in order to make the learning of the choreos faster. This will make your team a **digital team**. This means that you no longer have to work your team with notes and pens, but become one of the pioneers of the digital world.
was-ist-choreo-planer.question: What is the choreo planner?

weitergabe-an-dritte.answer: **No!** For us there is no reason to pass on your data to third parties. Protecting the personal data of your team members, especially minors, is very important to us. Therefore, your data will not be passed on to third parties. Please read about data protection in our [data protection declaration](/datenschutz).
weitergabe-an-dritte.question: Are my data passed on to third parties?

wie-viele-teams.answer: In a nutshell: as many you want! It is possible to create any number of clubs, teams, season, choreos and participants.
wie-viele-teams.question: How many teams can I manage?

zielgruppe.answer: The choreo planner is for **coaches of cheerleading teams**. The end products (countsheets, pictures and videos) should be shared to the teams in order to make the learning of the choreos easier.
zielgruppe.question: Who is the choreo planner for?

zusammenarbeiten.answer: A "live sharing" as is known from Google Docs or similar online tools is not planned. Instead, it is planned that coaches of an association **share access**. This should also make it easy to move participants between teams. A possible "create extra access" for an account is planned.
zusammenarbeiten.question: Can I work with others?

feedback.hilf-uns-besser-zu-werden: Help us to get better! Give us a short feedback to make your experience with the choreo planner even better.
feedback.vielen-dank: Thank you! We have saved your feedback and will start working on your suggestions for improvement.
feedback.was-gefaellt-dir-am-choreo-planer: What do you like about the choreo planner? What not?

impressumView.haftung-fuer-inhalte-text-1: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content in accordance with the general laws in accordance with Section 7 (1) TMG. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, as a service provider, I am not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored foreign information or to research circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressumView.haftung-fuer-inhalte-text-2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to the general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the date of knowledge of a specific violation. If the corresponding legal violations become known, I will remove this content immediately.
impressumView.haftung-fuer-links-text: My offer contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot guarantee this foreign content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of the link. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of the link. However, permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without specific indications of a violation of the law. If violations of the law become known, I will remove such links immediately.
impressumView.online-streitbeilegung-text-1: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
impressumView.online-streitbeilegung-text-2: I am not obliged to participate in dispute settlement procedures in front of a consumer arbitration board and do not take part.
impressumView.urheberrecht-text: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of utilization outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this page has not been created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. If you still become aware of a copyright infringement, I ask for a corresponding note. If violations of the law become known, I will remove such content immediately.
impressumView.verantwortlich-fuer-den-inhalt: Responsible for the content in accordance with Section 55 (2) RStV:

datenschutz.description: The data protection declaration of the choreo planner. Information on contact and liability regarding the use of the choreo planner.

defaults.description: Plan your choreographies quickly and easily with the choreo planner! Perfect for cheerleading, dance and floor gymnastics. 100% free. Try now!
defaults.keywords: choreo, choreography, cheer, cheerleading, dance, planner, editor, video, log in, register, countsheet
defaults.title: The best free online tool for choreo sport

create-season.jahr-info: The year of an extra season helps to sort. Leave the field empty if the squad cannot be assigned to a specific year.
create-season.name-info: The name of an extra season describes a squad and choreos for which purpose or period.

delete-account.info: If you delete your account, all information associated with it will be deleted. This includes clubs, teams, members, choreos, lineups and counts.
delete-account.verstanden: I understand and want to continue.

howto.aufstellungen-als-video-downloaden: Download the lineups as a video
howto.countsheet-info-1: Entries in the countsheet are defined by the count that you pass, a name and a list of participants.
howto.countsheet-info-2: {0} click on {1} or use the shortcuts {2} or {3} or make a {4} in the countsheet to create a new entry. You can set the name and choose who this entry applies. By default, the entry is created on the current count.
howto.countsheet-info-3: {0} Entries can be found in the list of list and countsheet entries. Click on {1} next to the entry you want to edit or use the shortcut {2} and click on {3} after editing to save your changes.
howto.countsheet-info-box: If you make the trouble to indicate who the entry applies, you can later hand out personal countsheets.
howto.download-info-1: {0} Click in the menu at the top right on {1} and select {2} to put together and download the countsheet.
howto.download-info-2: {0} Click in the menu at the top right on {1} and select {2} to create and download your video.
howto.lineup-text-1: Define in lineups where the participants of your choreo are on the mat. Each lineup consists of the positions for the participants and a period of how long the lineup is kept.
howto.lineup-text-2: {0} To create your first lineup, simply click on a participant on the mat and place the marker {1} to the desired area. A new lineup is automatically created or the participant is added to an existing lineup.
howto.lineup-text-3: {0} If lineups do not apply equally for everyone, you need several lists on the same count. If necessary, remove participants from the lineup by clicking on the list of lineups and countsheet entries on {1} and removing the ticks at the participants. Then click on {2}, select the participants for the second group and then pull the markers to the right place on the mat.
howto.ueberschneidung-warnung: If you define lineups that overlap for a participant, animations are not displayed correctly!

video-download.jerky-video-answer: The video is created in your browser, i.e. the performance of your device affects the quality of the video. Try closing other applications or restarting your browser.
video-download.file-issues-answer: If the video does not play on your device or a required format is missing or not compatible, there is nothing for you to do, unfortunately. Please check the help page for any information or contact us.
video-download.other-issue-answer: Take a look at our help page to perhaps solve your problem yourself.

logging.warning: %cAttention: %cThis console could be used to obtain information about your browser or device. Only give out information if you can independently verify that you are in contact with a representative of Choreo Planer.
logging.welcome:
%cWelcome to Choreo Planner
%cThank you for your commitment to choreo sports! You can use this console to find out some information about the application and your browser.

Here are a few helpful links:
Choreo Planner on IG:     https://www.instagram.com/choreoplaner
Get help:                           https://www.choreo-planer.de/hilfe
Contact us:                       info@choreo-planer.de
